column5: Does anyone know of a place where I can pick up a used 12v bow mount, preferably a minnkota, before the weekend and in southern ontario? I've looked around here, kijiji, bigfatbass....with no success. Thanks in advance.
Bronte Outdoors in Oakville tell Frank Peter sent you
Thanks everyone. I ended up finding a new 40lb Motorguide still unopened for $300.
